name: The sWitcher (Azurette)
description:
Help Flavio reach the exit of his factory by making his way through the treadmill. Program the treadmill first before you step in by changing position of the switch in the timeline.  Get the key to open the door, watch out not to drop it, the floor is made of mesh and wont stop it.

directional arrows : left right

space bar : jump

enter : start level

click on switch : program treadmills

1. program the treadmill by activating the switch in the bottom of the screen from left to right ( activation order )

2. open the hook to drop Flavio, treadmills will start

3. reach the door while getting the key

4. the door will be unlocked only when all treadmills stop, don't program too much treadmills !

/!\ Files safe to use, but new GMS2 update compiles the files in a way that Virus Total finds false positives.
